description: This file defines an adapter class for displaying a list of ActivityEntry objects within a RecyclerView in an Android app. It manages view creation, data binding, and item updates for activity logs.

classes.name: ActivityLogAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for RecyclerView that manages ActivityEntry items and binds them to item views.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for holding references to item view components (title and subtitle TextViews).

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with new items and refreshes the RecyclerView.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the item layout.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of items in the data set.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from an ActivityEntry to the ViewHolder for display.
